emails.subject: Weekly IT Newsletter
emails.body: Hello team, here's your weekly IT update. Remember to keep your software updated.

emails.subject: URGENT: Password Expires in 24 Hours!
emails.body: Your password will expire soon! Click the link below immediately to avoid losing access to your account.

emails.subject: Holiday Schedule 2025
emails.body: Please find attached the holiday schedule for 2025. Plan your time off accordingly.

emails.subject: Action Required: Verify Your Account
emails.body: We detected unusual activity on your account. Please verify your identity by clicking the link below within 1 hour.

emails.subject: Team Building Event Next Friday
emails.body: Join us for our quarterly team building event! RSVP on the intranet.

emails.subject: Your Account Has Been Compromised!
emails.body: ALERT: Suspicious login detected from Russia. Click immediately to secure your account or it will be suspended.

emails.subject: Expense Report Approved
emails.body: Your expense report #12345 has been approved. Payment will be processed within 5 business days.

emails.subject: Confidential: Wire Transfer Needed
emails.body: I need you to process an urgent wire transfer. This is confidential, don't tell anyone. Reply for details.
